Q. You talked about gift-giving. How can you tell if that gift-giving is grooming or innocent behavior?
A. So gift-giving in and of itself is not grooming. What we're talking about is it's part of an entire process. So you have to look at the context in which the gift is giving -- is given, I'm sorry.
Obviously we know anyone can give a gift to someone else for perfectly reasonable reasons.
